title: BRIEF-Telaria Inc Q4 ‍Loss Per Share $0.02​
text: February 26, 2018 / 12:27 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Telaria Inc Q4 ‍Loss Per Share $0.02​ Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Telaria Inc: * TELARIA REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 45 PERCENT TO $15 MILLION * QTRLY ‍LOSS PER SHARE $0.02​ * SEES Q1 2018 ‍REVENUE $8.5 MILLION TO $10.0 MILLION​ * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE ‍$58.0 MILLION TO $62.0 MILLION​ * SEES ‍FY 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA $5.0 MILLION TO $8.0 MILLION​ * SEES Q1 2018 ‍ADJ LBITDA BETWEEN LOSS OF $4.5 MILLION TO LOSS OF $3.5 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
